cards.title: Design database schema
cards.description: Create the database schema for the new customer management system.

cards.title: Implement user authentication
cards.description: Develop a secure authentication system using JWT

cards.title: Design user interface
cards.description: Create wireframes and prototypes of the user interface for the web application.

cards.title: Optimize SQL queries
cards.description: Improve performance of SQL queries in the database.

cards.title: Document REST API
cards.description: Write documentation for the system's REST API using Swagger.

cards.title: Implement export functionality
cards.description: Develop the ability to export data to formats such as CSV and Excel.

cards.title: Fix form validation errors
cards.description: Resolve data validation issues in user input forms.

cards.title: Set up development environment
cards.description: Install and configure necessary tools for project development.

cards.title: Develop customer management module
cards.description: Implement functionality to add, modify, and delete customers in the system.

cards.title: Conduct integration testing
cards.description: Execute integration tests to ensure proper functioning of system components.

cards.title: Conduct code review
cards.description: Review team's code to identify potential improvements and prevent errors.

cards.title: Configure production server
cards.description: Set up the production server to host the application and make it accessible to the public.
